Home Libraries People FAQ More
basic_static_string::operator= (2 of 5 overloads)

Assign to the string.

Synopsis 
constexpr basic_static_string&
operator=(
    const_pointer s);
Description

Replaces the contents with those of {s, s + traits_type::length(s)).

Complexity

Linear in count.

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee.

Return Value

*this

Parameters

Name

Description

s

A pointer to the string to copy from.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

traits_type::length(s) > max_size().
